resources.string: Shared from the Slideshow gallery android app available at https://market.android.com/details?id=com.elsewhat.android.slideshow
Please note that on GoogleTV the wallpaper is generally visible and unfortunately our app cannot override that
Failed to set this photo as wallpaper. This problem should only apply to the three first photos
Please restart the app now that cached photos have been deleted
